column4: Hi there, anyone could tell me what would be the easiest way to have my webserver (apache) ask for a password on a specific folder only for external traffic, i want to local people (192.168.1.*) to be able to browse the folder without entering passwords ?
I'm not too savvy on it though
i tried to play with .htaccess too but with no luck, so then i think it's back to reading about .htaccess
